anomalies.description: Same transaction recorded more than once.
Transactions present in one record but absent in another.
Differences in transaction amounts between records.
Transactions not approved or recognized by the entity.
Inconsistent transaction dates across records.
Debits and credits not equaling as expected.
Incorrect application of exchange rates.
Transactions recorded in wrong accounts.
Transactions that are canceled but not properly recorded.
Delays causing transactions to appear in different periods.
Unauthorized or deceitful activities recorded.
Manual input mistakes leading to inaccuracies.
Legitimate transactions not recorded in the system.
Failures in data transfer between systems causing inconsistencies.
Transactions that do not comply with internal policies.
Transactions exceeding predefined limits.
Unusual transaction behaviors deviating from norms.
Discrepancies in reversed credit card transactions.
Differences between vendor invoices and internal purchase records.
Incorrect or unexpected bank charges not aligning with agreements.
